content.text:
# List of international presidential trips made by Kais Saied

This is a list of international presidential trips made by Kais Saied, the current President of Tunisia.
List
2020
{| class="wikitable"
|-
! width=120|Country
! width=100|Areas visited
! width=90|Date(s)
! width=550|Notes
|-
|
|Algiers
|2 February
|Working visit. Met with President Abdelmadjid Tebboune.
|-
|
|Paris
|22–23 June
|Met with President Emmanuel Macron.
|-
|
|Doha
|14–16 November
|State visit. Met with Emir Tamim bin Hamad Al Thani.
|}
2021
{| class="wikitable"
|-
! width=120|Country
! width=100|Areas visited
! width=90|Date(s)
! width=550|Notes
|-
|
|Tripoli
|17 March
|Working visit. Met with Chairman of the Presidential Council Mohamed al-Menfi and Prime Minister Abdul Hamid Dbeibeh.
|-
|
|Cairo
|9–11 April
|Working visit. Met with President Abdel Fattah el-Sisi.
|-
|
|Paris
|17–18 May
|Attended the Summit on the Financing of African Economies.
|-
|
|Rome
|16–17 June
|Official visit.
|}
2022
{| class="wikitable"
|-
! width=120|Country
! width=100|Areas visited
! width=90|Date(s)
! width=550|Notes
|-
|
|Brussels
|17–18 February
|Attended the 6th European Union–African Union Summit.
|-
|
|Algiers
|4–5 July
|Working visit. Met with President Abdelmadjid Tebboune.
|-
|
|Algiers
|1–2 November
|Attended the 31st Arab League summit.
|-
|
|Riyadh and Medina
|9–10 December
|Attended the 2022 China-Arab States Summit. Visited the Prophet's Mosque.
|-
|
|Washington, D.C.
|13–15 December
|Attended the United States–Africa Leaders Summit 2022. Met with Secretary of State Antony Blinken.
|}
2023
{| class="wikitable"
|-
! width=120|Country
! width=100|Areas visited
! width=90|Date(s)
! width=550|Notes
|-
|
|Jeddah
|19 May
|Attended the 32nd Arab League summit. Met with Crown Prince of Saudi Arabia Mohammed bin Salman and Syrian President Bashar al-Assad.
|-
|
|Paris
|22–23 June
|Attended the Paris Summit for a New Global Financing Pact. Met with President Emmanuel Macron.
|}
2024
and Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni during the 2024 Italy–Africa Summit.]]
{| class="wikitable"
|-
! width=120|Country
! width=100|Areas visited
! width=90|Date(s)
! width=550|Notes
|-
|
|Rome
|28–29 January
|Attended the 2024 Italy–Africa Summit. Met with Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni.
|-
|
|Algiers
|2 March
|Attended the 7th GECF Summit.
|-
|
|Tehran
|22 May
|Attended the funeral of President Ebrahim Raisi. Met with Supreme Leader Ali Khamenei.
|-
|
|Beijing
|28 May – 1 June
|State visit. Attended the 10th opening ceremony of the China–Arab States Cooperation Forum. Met with General Secretary Xi Jinping and Premier Li Qiang.
|-
|
|Algiers
|1 November
|Attended the 70th anniversary celebrations of the Algerian Revolution.
|}
2025
{| class="wikitable"
|-
! width=120|Country
! width=100|Areas visited
! width=90|Date(s)
! width=550|Notes
|-
|
|Algiers
|3–4 September
|Attended the 4th Intra-African Trade Fair. Met with President Abdelmadjid Tebboune.
|}
